pkgmetadata.longdescription: Convert Lit is a simple program to use .lit or Microsoft ebook files on Linux. It's able to "explode" the ebook into Open Ebook Specification Format (OEBPS), which than can be read by Opera and other Linux programs (it's just xml, html, png and jpeg). Note that you won't get any DRM-bypassing, so your .lit-file must not be copy protected.
